attributes.action: Give all healthcare professionals an immediate 10% pay rise to say thank you!
attributes.additional_details: At the start of the crisis, nurses and other health care professionals were working without adequate equipment including PPE.      They helped thousands of people, bearing   the brunt of the crisis, working in intolerable situations providing kindness,  commitment and compassion. We have to show the government that they are out of step with the national mood,    and that despite these  financial circumstances, we must reward our  national heroes!
attributes.background: During the past year when the country has faced its largest national crisis since  the Second World War, our healthcare professionals  have pulled  the country through, often at great risk to themselves and their families. we Believe their sacrifice  must be rewarded with a minimum 10% pay rise.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Support NHS staff with a pay rise this year of 3% or more: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578071

Give NHS Covid heroes a minimum 5% pay rise: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578004

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Increase pay for all NHS staff by 15%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151
